title: Zmodo 8CH Wireless Security Camera System - 1080P HDMI NVR No Hard Drive, 4 x 720P HD Indoor/Outdoor Wireless Cameras Night Vision - WiFi Easy Installation No Video Cables Needed
feature: 【Easy Installation & Setup】: No need to run cables all over your house to connect the NVR and cameras. Simply mount the cameras, plug in the adapters and go. Connection between the NVR and cameras is through your internet.

【Complete Camera Solution】: Watch your home day and night in crisp 720p HD with the indoor and outdoor cameras. The indoor outdoor cameras have 81° wide viewing angle, which enables you to see your home 24/7, rain or shine.

【Clip Alerts on Phones】: Receive a clip alert on your Zmodo app whenever motion is detected, and customize which areas on the cameras’ live view will trigger an motion alert, to prevent false alerts and get notified by alerts that really matters.

【Remote & Local Playback】: Cameras are built with excellent quality for 24/7 HD monitoring jobs, and video feed is saved to the NVR(No hard drive included). Watch the playback either locally on your monitors, or remotely on your phones through Zmodo app.

【3-Year Warranty】: Lifetime US-Based Tech Support, 3-Year Limited Warranty, and 60-Day Money Back Guarantee. (Note: 'Wireless' refers to 'Wireless Signal Transmission'. Each camera still needs to be plugged into a nearby outlet for power.) Compare with similar items
description: OverviewThe Zmodo wireless camera system is a 4 camera monitoring solution for your home or business. Setup is as simple as downloading the free Zmodo App, creating an account, and connect the cameras to your Wi-Fi. Once setup, you can remotely view from anywhere with a smartphone, iPad or PC. Enjoy peace of mind no matter where you are and be notified when something happens. .Advantages* Easy Setup - Connect the NVR and cameras within minutes using Zmodo app. * Easy Remote Access - Enjoy peace of mind via your smartphone no matter where you are. * Stay Connected - Be notified when something happens with intelligent mobile alerts.NVR Features* IP video input: 8CH 720P HD/ 4CH 1080P IPC * Video Resolution: 720P HD * Record Rate: 100fps * Record Mode: Normal Recording / Intelligent Recording / Motion Activated Recording * Playback: Fast forward / Rewind / Slow play / Digital Zoom * HDMI Output: 1 ChannelOutdoor Camera Feature* Image Sensor: 720p color sensor * Number of IR LEDs: 24 * IR distance: Night vision up to 20m * Lens: 2.8mm * Angle of View: 81 degree * Operating Temperature: 14°F~122°F * Frame Rate: 25fps * Weatherproof: Yes, IP65Package Includes* (1) 8CH Network Security NVR (No HDD Included)* (4) 720p HD Wireless Security Camera * (4) 5V/1A Power Supply for Cameras * (1) 12V/2A Power Supply for NVR * (1) Ethernet Cable * (1) Quick Guide
